code: export var GLOBALTYPES={AUTH:"AUTH",ALERT:"ALERT",THEME:"THEME",STATUS:"STATUS",MODAL:"MODAL",USER_TYPE:"USER_TYPE",SOCKET:"SOCKET"};export var EditData=function EditData(data,id,post){var newData=data.map(function(item){return item._id===id?post:item;});return newData;};export var DeleteData=function DeleteData(data,id){var newData=data.filter(function(item){return item._id!==id;});return newData;};
